content: this pattern is a revision of my merry-go-baby hat pattern https //crochetonthebrain com/2016/01/16/merry-go-baby-hat-free-pattern/ originally it was available in only one size it is now available in 7 sizes newborn through adult the pattern instructions have changed slightly from the original plus it now includes instructions for a ribbed cuff which the original didn t have for the smaller sizes one skein of the suggested yarn will make up to 2 hats but as the hat sizes increase the number of skeins used will increase too
